name: Chill and Chart
description:
Welcome to this island!

You're a royal cartographer and have found yourself on uncharted land. This life is serene. You want to take in the world around you, discover what makes this place special and map out your time here for other to enjoy.

Open the map pressing 'M'.

You can walk around the island using WASD and mouse.

The game will lock the mouse, just press 'ESC' to recover it.

Made by Matthew Newcombe, Danette Beatty, and Alejandro Cámara for the London Slow Game Jam in March 2017.
